price: 29. They said: "Glory to Our Lord! Verily, we have been Zâlimûn (wrong-doers)."
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
